name: Sly 2: Band of Thieves
description: Join Sly Cooper and his Band of Thieves as they prepare for the biggest job of their lives. This comically cool, crime caper delivers a plot full of drama, deceit, misfit romance and surprising twists. You will never guess who's playin' who! It's a true game of cat and mouse as the Cooper's 3 outwit the KLAWW gang and the divas of Interpol.
